channel.title: LINUX Unplugged
channel.description: An open show powered by community LINUX Unplugged takes the best attributes of open collaboration and turns it into a weekly show about Linux.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Weekly Linux talk show with no script, no limits, surprise guests and tons of opinion.
channel.itunes:author: Jupiter Broadcasting
channel.itunes:summary: An open show powered by community LINUX Unplugged takes the best attributes of open collaboration and turns it into a weekly show about Linux.

item.title: 635: The Texas Linux Fest Special
item.author: Jupiter Broadcasting
item.itunes:author: Jupiter Broadcasting
item.itunes:subtitle: Our cross-continent race to Texas Linux Fest culminates into fantastic meat, meetups, and more.
item.description:
Our cross-continent race to Texas Linux Fest culminates into fantastic meat, meetups, and more.

Sponsored By:

  • Managed Nebula: Meet Managed Nebula from Defined Networking. A decentralized VPN built on the open-source Nebula platform that we love.
  • 1Password Extended Access Management: 1Password Extended Access Management is a device trust solution for companies with Okta, and they ensure that if a device isn't trusted and secure, it can't log into your cloud apps.
  • Unraid: A powerful, easy operating system for servers and storage. Maximize your hardware with unmatched flexibility.

Support LINUX Unplugged

  • TXLF 2025 Sat Oct 4 - Lessons They Don't Teach You in School: A Year in High-Performance Computing
  • TXLF 2025 Sat Oct 4 - I got Malware, BTW. A quick look at the rising trend of Linux Malware
  • A Gift for the Open Source Community: Chainguardâ€™s CVE-Free Raspberry Pi Images (Beta)
  • Chainguard for Raspberry Pi
  • Chainguard's Images
  • Wes Payne - Mesh Network Sidecars for NixOS Services - Texas Linux Fest
  • noblepayne/meshSidecar: Mesh network sidecars for NixOS Services
  • Pick: isd â€” isd (interactive systemd) â€“ a better way to work with systemd units.
  • ISD 0.6 Released For Interactive Systemd Management
item.itunes:keywords: Jupiter Broadcasting, Linux Podcast, Linux Unplugged, open source, Texas Linux Fest, TXLF, race to Texas, race, meetup, Texas Tracker, Dawarich, live tracker, Moose vs Bogfoot, Moose FTW, Chainguard, meshSidecar, Fake Boost, fake sats, Config Confessions, Buc-ees Boost, isd, systemd, Dustin Kirkland
item.content:encoded:
Our cross-continent race to Texas Linux Fest culminates into fantastic meat, meetups, and more.

Sponsored By:

  • Managed Nebula: Meet Managed Nebula from Defined Networking. A decentralized VPN built on the open-source Nebula platform that we love.
  • 1Password Extended Access Management: 1Password Extended Access Management is a device trust solution for companies with Okta, and they ensure that if a device isn't trusted and secure, it can't log into your cloud apps.
  • Unraid: A powerful, easy operating system for servers and storage. Maximize your hardware with unmatched flexibility.

Support LINUX Unplugged
